column3: - vous pourrez de nouveau négocier le §Y[This.adventurer_negotiate_cd.GetExpiryDate]§!

column2: This Casus Belli will become unavailable after §Y25 years§! have passed since the game started.

column2: For as long as this Casus Belli is available, the §YBorder Dispute§! Casus Belli will be unavailable.
